data.actual_result: The keyboard is open as well as the member list/channel drawer, and you can type behind
data.expected_result: I don't think it's a bug that tapping both Add file and Member list opens two things. However, I believe that switching to regular keyboard from the Attach file menu should close one of them or at least prevent you from typing
data.short_description: Can type behind the channel drawer and member list
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server - Tap on Add file button and Member list button at the same time. Also works with Channel drawer - Tap the Keyboard button on the attach file menu
